definition: The largest value recorded on a date or any continuous period of 24 hours as specified elsewhere in the metadata.
The smallest value recorded on a date or any continuous period of 24 hours as specified elsewhere in the metadata.
A value representing the average over one day. The method for calculating daily means varies depending on the type of observations being made.
The square root of the average of the squares of deviations about the mean of a set of data.
The completeness of data received from the sensors deployed on the platform based on the expected data resolution time interval.
